name: Neon Shifter VR
description:
The end of a long sleep has come. Master power of lasers, solve logic puzzles and escape from prison made from your lost power.

Neon Shifter VR is logic puzzler for Oculus Rift with 2 Touch Controllers. Puzzles are based on laser manipulation - each hand can shoot a laser in given color and by using interactive objects you can change reflection angle of laser and change, blend or transfer its color. Your task is to destroy your prison by providing proper laser to exit gate.

Controls:
- Index Trigger - shoot laser
- R Index Trigger + R Hand Trigger - pick up power ball
- shoot + Hand Trigger - move interactive object
- A - rotate cube
